org.easybatch.core.processor

Class AbstractRecordMarshaller<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.core.processor.AbstractRecordMarshaller<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of object to marshall
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordMarshaller<T>, RecordProcessor<T,java.lang.String>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApacheCommonCsvRecordMarshaller, DelimitedRecordMarshaller, FixedLengthRecordMarshaller, GsonRecordMarshaller, JacksonRecordMarshaller, XmlRecordMarshaller, XstreamRecordMarshaller

    public abstract class AbstractRecordMarshaller<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordMarshaller<T>
    Abstract implementation of the RecordMarshaller interface.

    Implementations should simply override the marshal(java.lang.Object) method

    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
